short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Declutter tabs with keyword filtering. Simplify your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We want to help people to work with a lot of tabs easier. 🚀

TabBrew is a tab manager tool that provides a simple way to manage and declutter your browser tabs. Make a keyword to filter tabs. Help you simplify your workflow.

Highlight Features 🌟

● Tab Filter & Tab Desk

Easily filter and organize your tabs with intuitive keyword-based filtering, ensuring quick access to relevant content.

Features
● Tab Filter & Tab Desk
● Tab Collections
● Tab Note
● Tab Uncategorized
● Tab Sidebar
● Tab Space
● Tasks

Tab Manager Tool
● Close duplicate tabs
● Merge windows
● Discard tabs
● Sort tabs
● Group tabs
● Save tabs

Stay focus and easy to look what you interested.

The sidebar will help you to view your tabs easily and keep focus and reduce your time to manage tabs. You can use the declutter tool when you get many tabs.

Multitasking on your tabs!

Experience seamless multitasking and enhanced productivity with TabBrew – Your Ultimate Tab Manager Tool.

-------

For support inquiries or feedback, please reach out to us at tabbrew.app@gmail.com.
